The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 09 January is 2,613,838 (4,643.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 04 January, there were 381,355 new confirmed cases (677.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 28 December, there were 238,964 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 60% (142,391 extra cases).
